properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM INQUIRY WHERE INQUIRY_WRITER = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT INQUIRY_NO , INQUIRY_WRITER , INQUIRY_CATEGORY_BIG , INQUIRY_CATEGORY_SMALL , INQUIRY_TITLE , INQUIRY_CONTENT , INQUIRY_ENROLL_DATE , INQUIRY_STATUS , INQUIRY_ANSWER , INQUIRY_ANSWER_DATE FROM INQUIRY WHERE INQUIRY_WRITER = ? ORDER BY INQUIRY_ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT INQUIRY_NO , INQUIRY_WRITER , INQUIRY_CATEGORY_BIG , INQUIRY_CATEGORY_SMALL , INQUIRY_TITLE , INQUIRY_CONTENT , INQUIRY_ENROLL_DATE , INQUIRY_STATUS , INQUIRY_ANSWER , INQUIRY_ANSWER_DATE FROM INQUIRY WHERE INQUIRY_WRITER = ? ORDER BY INQUIRY_ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM = ?
